<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Two Column Table</title>
  <style>
    table {
      width: 100%;
      border-collapse: collapse;
    }
    td, th {
      border: 1px solid #999;
      padding: 8px;
      text-align: left;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <table>
    <tr>
      <th>Column 1</th>
      <th>Column 2</th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Data Row 1, Col 1</td>
      <td>Data Row 1, Col 2</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Data Row 2, Col 1</td>
      <td>Data Row 2, Col 2</td>
    </tr>
  </table>

</body>
</html>
